chapters.title: Chapter 1: An Empty Road
chapters.info: Egwene al'Vere is a 17-year-old girl from Emond's Field. She is the daughter of Bran, the Mayor of Emond's Field, and his wife Marin. Egwene has four older sisters; Berowyn, Alene, Elisa, and Loise; and resents them at times for treating her as the baby of the family. See also al'Vere, Alene; al'Vere, Berowyn; al'Vere, Brandelwyn; al'Vere, Elisa; al'Vere, Loise; al'Vere, Marin.
